text: Tomorrow's World was a BBC television programme about science and technology. It ran from 1965 to 2003. Raymond Baxter was the programme's first presenter until he left in 1977. There have been many other presenters on the programme. == References == == Other websites == * Category:BBC Television programmes Category:1965 television series debuts Category:1960s British television series Category:1970s British television series Category:1980s British television series Category:1990s British television series Category:2000s British television series Category:2003 British television series endings
title: Tomorrow's World
